DESCRIPTION: Create a deck consisting of cards to fight the boss!
IN_RAID: The command cannot be used while in raid
UNIQUE_WARN: Note : All moves in a deck have to be unique in order to use them for duels or raids!
MISSING_SILVERS: You do not have enough `Silver` to unlock the slot
UNLOCK_WARN: Unlock the slot {{deckNo}} to generate deck
MISSING_CODES: > At least 3 card codes are required
MOVES_UNIQUE: All moves in the deck must be unique | Select a different card or move for the same card
SAVE_DECK: Click on save to set this deck
EMBED_FOOTER: Note : All moves in a deck have to be unique in order to use them for duels or raids!
UNLOCK_SAVE: Unlock the slot {{deckNo}} to save the deck
UNLOCK_GENERATE: Unlock the slot ${deckNo} to generate a random deck
NOT_ENOUGH_CARD: Not enough cards with different moves. Please collect more cards
UNLOCK_SELECT: Unlock the slot {{deckNo}} to select deck
